doc.field: A large pile of loose papers re: WTC, 2007-14. Some things that stood out: health & safety plan for forensic sifting operations at JFK Airport (2011); WTC Phase IV Sifting Operations at Fresh Kills Landfill 2013; Reports/reconciliations on PHR (Potential Human Remains) locations and totals found, especially daily reports from Fresh Kills operation; OCME daily Situation Reports; 51 Park Place and 130 Cedar Street related reports and emails; photocopies of agreements to donate FDNY vehicles to museums; reports of specifically identified remains by individual; WTC Office of Chief Medical Examiner Operational statistics; Remediation and Deconstruction of Fiterman Hall 2006. Photographs of a small award/recognition event; there are CDs labeled WTC recovery award group shots, so likely is that (2009). Print-outs of emails to Spadafora on the subject matter. Print-outs of web articles from news outlets on the human remains subject. (Includes digital formats)
